Header.title: UniFi
Header.paragraph: Welcome to UniFi, your ultimate guide to discovering the perfect IT degree program at private universities in Sri Lanka.

About.paragraph: At UniFi, our mission is to empower A/L students in Sri Lanka with the tools and insights they need to choose the right IT degree program. We combine cutting-edge technology with comprehensive data analysis to provide personalized, relevant recommendations.

Services.name: Research Paper
Services.text: Yet to be submitted, link will be updated soon.

Team.name: Asiru Rathnayaka
Team.uniname: SLIIT | Sri Lanka Institute of Information Technology

Features.title: Personalized Suggestions
Features.text: Using a random forest classifier, we suggest degree categories that match your profile, providing a matching percentage for each option.Receive a list of degree programs within broader categories like IT, Computer Science, Cyber Security, and more.

Features.title: Eye Tracking Analytics
Features.text: Enhance the relevance of your degree recommendations with our eye-tracking component. By analyzing your interactions and preferences, we refine our suggestions to better match your interests and needs.

Features.title: OpenAI support
Features.text: Get personalized assistance when filling out your profile with our OpenAI-powered input fields. Based on your existing information, OpenAI recommends inputs that ensure your profile is as accurate and complete as possible, improving the relevance of our degree recommendations.

Features.title: Profile Creation
Features.text: Start by creating your profile and providing information about your A/L stream, interests, skills, and location preferences.Our system compares your profile with data from past graduates, collected through surveys, interviews, and workplace visits.

ProjectScope.title: Research Problem
ProjectScope.description: Choosing the right IT degree program is challenging for A/L students in Sri Lanka, as it greatly impacts their future academic and professional success.
ProjectScope.solutionDescribe: Our solution involves leveraging advanced technologies like machine learning (specifically random forest classifiers) and eye-tracking analytics to analyze student profiles comprehensively. By suggesting IT degree categories aligned with their interests and academic backgrounds, we aim to alleviate decision-making challenges post A/L education.
ProjectScope.ResearchObjectives: To assist A/L students in Sri Lanka by providing personalized IT degree program recommendations, enhancing decision-making through data analysis and advanced technologies.
